channel.title: rhadoop on JavaChen Blog - Ramblings of a coder
channel.description: Recent content in rhadoop on JavaChen Blog - Ramblings of a coder

item.title: 安装RHadoop
item.description: 1. R Language Install 安装相关依赖 1 2 3 4 yum install -y perl* pcre-devel tcl-devel zlib-devel bzip2-devel libX11-devel tk-devel tetex-latex *gfortran* compat-readline5 yum install libRmath-* rpm -Uvh --force --nodeps R-core-2.10.0-2.el5.x86_64.rpm rpm -Uvh R-2.10.0-2.el5.x86_64.rpm R-devel-2.10.0-2.el5.x86_64.rpm 编译安装：R-3.0.1 1 2 3 4 5 tar -zxvf R-3.0.1 ./configure make make install #R运行 export HADOOP_CMD=/usr/bin/hadoop 排
